text: Really enjoyed playing my goblin deck last night
B/R wort currently. I liked the aggro feel but also the interactive elements like siege gang commander
I felt like black wasnt adding much and wort was kinda slow, though not worthless
It gives you better kill spells and draw, which is nice.
Easier recursion, too
What are some goblin commanders that could be a bit more aggressive but #1 dont just outright suck, #2 high on hipster scale (not krenko)
Um
I was thinking kiki jiki
That's a bit more combo usually, but I suppose it could work
Yeah like make copy of etb goblins
Grenzo, maybe?
Mono red or br
Either.
Mono red one i feel lije casting other peoples cards isnt that synergistic
They're both pretty hipster.
You can just use it for goad.
That's super aggro
Yeah
Thats true
Hes low cmc too
Ok im not unsold
2 mana ftw
Goad early game, steal stuff late
Icould see how goad opens up holes to attack
Goad is better than it looks.
Ok i think ill go for this
